Running molecular dynamics simulations using NAMD

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Running molecular dynamics simulations using NAMD](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/computational-chemistry/tutorials/md-simulation-namd/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
